name: PicoClaw - Ultra-Lightweight AI Assistant | Go-Powered
snippet:
Ultra-lightweight personal AI assistant built with Go . Memory usage under 10MB, multi-platform deployment, lightning-fast startup in under 1 second.
PicoClaw is an ultra-lightweight personal AI assistant built with Go, inspired by the nanobot project. It features extremely low resource usage (under 10MB memory), multi-architecture deployment, and integration with multiple messaging platforms. 95% of the core code is auto-generated by AI agents, continuously optimized through human-in-the-loop.

name: PicoClaw ‚Äî Ultra-Lightweight AI Assistant | $10 Hardware
snippet: PicoClaw is an open-source, ultra-lightweight personal AI assistant written in Go. Runs on $10 RISC-V hardware with under 10MB RAM and boots in 1 second. 99% less memory than OpenClaw. Supports Telegram, Discord, QQ & more.
